post:
New this year, we are providing the opportunity to get up to 50% off of a VPS server with us for life (monthly, quarterly and annual plans)! That includes during product upgrades! Just use the code below to claim your discount when placing your order.

OPENVZ PLANS ONLY!

We accept Paypal, Bitcoin, and all major credit cards!

https://cometvps.com/

Free 2Gbps DDoS Protection is provided with every server! IPv6 is available upon request on all packages.

Need cPanel? We can provide that too, just select it during checkout, as well as other add-ons!
